channel.title: About me on Sergi Barroso
channel.description: Recent content in About me on Sergi Barroso

item.description: Personal values Empathy High standards Good isn’t good enough. All work has to be top notch Meaningful long-term Make short term sacrifices for long term success Ownership is key Don’t blame others, make excuses. Taking ownership is synonym of being resourceful and creative to find solutions Data driven God feeling is helpful for personal things but not for scientific solutions Truth driven Be honest and transparent to everybody (including yourself)

item.title: test
item.description: Aenean posuere, tortor sed cursus feugiat, nunc augue blandit nunc, eu sollicitudin urna dolor sagittis lacus. Donec elit libero, sodales nec, volutpat a, suscipit non, turpis. Nullam sagittis. Suspendisse pulvinar, augue ac venenatis condimentum, sem libero volutpat nibh, nec pellentesque velit pede quis nunc.
